"ardtyp"."doc_typ" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "Cstm_" on "azonhdr"."Cstm_No" = "Cstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."AreaList" "Cstm_Area" on "Cstm_"."AreaNo" = "Cstm_Area"."AreaNo" left join "ardmast"."countrdus" left join "dbo"."CarInfom" "car" on "azonhdr"."carno" = "car"."Car_No" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "carCar_Type" on "car"."Car_Type" = "carCar_Type"."Styl_No" left join "carfuelllevel" on "car"."fuelllevel" = "carfuelllevel"."FuellevelDisplayid" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "carsgm" on "car"."sgm" = "carsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "carsgmOpco" on on "car"."Insurance_type" = "carInsurance_type"."Insurance_type" left join "dbo"."Likelist" "carCar_Lik" on "car"."Car_Lik" = "carCar_Lik"."LikeNo" left join "dbo"."padnaturewaylist" "carpadnatureway" on "carCstm_"."Slm_No" = "carCstm_Slm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."Stsuplir" "carSup_" on "car"."Sup_No" = "carSup_"."Sup_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "carSup_Acc_" on "carSup_"."Acc_No" = left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "carSup_Curncy_" on "carSup_"."Curncy_No" = "carSup_Curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Tamweelrequest" "carTamweelreq" on "car"."Tamweelreqid" = "carTamweelreq"."Tamweelreqid" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "carTamweelreqCurncy_" on "carTamweelreq"."Curncy_No" = "carTamweelreqCurncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "carTamweelreqCstm_" on "carTamweelreq"."Cstm_No" = "carTamweelreqCstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."tasedwaylist" "carTamweelreqtasedway" on "carTamweelreq"."tasedwayid" = "carTamweelreqtasedway"."tasedwayid" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Thebranch" on "azonhdr"."ardtypnm" = "Thebranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "sgm" on "azonhdr"."Tarhel" = "sgm"."sgmid"

field.name: Cstm_acc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm
field.label: Cstm acc Acc Bnd Acc Nm

field.name: carEMP_Emp_no1Emp_NOt
field.label: car EMP Emp no1 Emp N Ot

action.data:
delete from [dbo].[azondtl] where countrdus = @countrdus INSERT INTO [dbo].[azondtl] ([countrdus] ,[ID_comp] ,[Unit_No] ,[invoi_ln_no] ,[quantity] ,[length] ,[width] ,[flag] ) select @countrdus AS [locno], [ID_comp], [Unit_No], [ln_no], [carno], [quantity], [countrdus], 0 from arddital where [countrdus] = @locno
set @Result_RefreshChildren=1

delete from [dbo].[azondtl] where countrdus = @countrdus INSERT INTO [dbo].[azondtl] ([countrdus] ,[ID_comp] ,[Unit_No] ,[invoi_ln_no] ,[quantity] ,[length] ,[width] ,[flag]) select @countrdus AS [locno], [Itm_No], [Unit_No], [ln_no], [carno], [quantity], [Doc_No], 1 from Stsaldtl where [Doc_No] = @carno
UPDATE [dbo].[azondtl] set iinvoice = width where countrdus=@countrdus set @Result_RefreshChildren=1

businessRules.rule: DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'Before' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @countrdus,@Brn_No,@TRFBrn_NO if @locno is not null and @carno is not null begin /* prevent the default action processing */ set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 /* set the focus on the field and display an error */ set @Result_Focus = 'locno,لا يجوز اختيار طلب بيع وفاتورة معا!' end

DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'Before' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @countrdus,@Brn_No,@TRFBrn_NO if @locno is not null and @carno is not null begin /* prevent the default action processing */ set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 /* set the focus on the field and display an error */ set @Result_Focus = 'locno,لا يجوز اختيار طلب بيع وفاتورة معا!' end

DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'After' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @countrdus,@Brn_No,@TRFBrn_NO if @doc_typ = 1 begin update azonhdr set later = 'نقدي' where countrdus=@countrdus and carno is not null set @Result_NavigateUrl = 'webreportviwer.aspx?reportquery=' + @Arguments_Controller + '&idfilter=' + cast(@countrdus as nvarchar) end
